blocked_alert.message: Mining is blocked. Check your security system settings.

blocked_desc.message:
Some security systems can block CryptoTab work.

You need to unlock the script to start mining and earn money. Please, check your security system settings to start mining.

feedback_desc.message: We will try to make CryptoTab better. If you have any suggestions how to improve this extension please contact us at

login_desc.message: To save your BTC and list of referrers you need to sign in.

login_popup_desc.message:
We recommend you to press Login and sign in your Facebook or Google account after the plugin installation. It will automatically save your Bitcoin balance and referral network.

To restore your account on a new device, you need to download CryptoTab, press Login and sign in with your Facebook or Google account.

login_popup_title.message: Please login to save your earnings

mail_sharing_text.message: Hi there! Do you already know about CryptoTab extension for Google Chrome? Now you can earn Bitcoins while just using the browser. Get more than 1 BTC per month, really! Check more details by this url and you will thank me later, for sure -

mail_sharing_title.message: Earn Bitcoins while using Google Chrome

mining_desc.message: Google Chrome must be opened to mine Bitcoin. However, you can close this window and you will continue to mine.

multiplier_desc.message: Invite people by personal url and earn an additional % of bitcoins they mine. The more your referal network grows, more gain you have.

network_desc.message:
In order to use Cryptotab properly, you need to have connection to the internet.

Check your network settings and relaunch the browser.

rate_desc.message: If you're happy with CryptoTab, please leave a positive feedback at the Chrome Web Store page.

refer_new.message: Refer new users and earn much more!

slide_1.message: Invite active friends who will invite their friends - and start making real money! Earn more than 1 BTC per month!

slide_2.message: Invest your time and effort inviting new users and you will guarantee a high passive income for yourself for a long time.

slide_3.message: You will always earn bonuses for your friends and their friends then using CryptoTab!

tip_1.message: Here is your current BTC balance with update frequency approx. 10 min.

tip_2.message: Adjust your mining speed in here, or turn it off altogether at any time.

tip_3.message: Invite new users by your personal link and rapidly boost your bitcoin income.

tip_4.message: Log in, withdraw your BTC, adjust settings and more from the side panel.

tip_5.message: Check how big is your referral network and invite new users to boost your earnings. We recommend you to sign in using your Google or Facebook account to save data.

tip_6.message: To open main screen press CryptoTab icon in the extension bar.

tooltip_4dig.message: We add 4 more digits to bitcoin amount to help you see the progress in earnings.

no_connection_title.message: It seems you have no internet connection

no_connection_text.message: Please, connect to the internet to get access to CryptoTab mining features and your account.

unavailable_title_text.message: Sorry for inconvenience, we've got some maintenance works on our backend upstream cluster, please try to connect CryptoTab later.
